name: Sync Jira Tickets Status on FortiSOAR
description: Update FortiSOAR Alert Status as per Jira Status

resource.closureNotes: Alert closed due to its corresponding ticket closed on Jira

step_variables.__dummy: {% for item in vars.foundTicketID %}{% for alert in vars.steps.Find_Alerts | flatten %}{% if item.id == alert.jiraTicketID %}{% set _ = item.update({'@id':alert['@id']}) %}{% endif %}{% endfor %}{% endfor %}

step_variables.foundTicketID: {% set _data = [] %}{% for item in  vars.steps.Get_Existing_Tickets.data.issues %}{% set _ = _data.append({'id':item.id, 'status':item.fields.status.name}) %}{% endfor %}{{_data}}
